text: Barbara Bel Geddes (born October 31, 1922 â€“ August 8, 2005) was an American television and movie actress. She was born in New York City. She acted in many television programs and movies. She performed as Ellie Ewing in the television show Dallas. Bel Geddes died of lung cancer in 2005 in Maine. == Other websites == * Category:1922 births Category:2005 deaths Category:Actors from New York (state) Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors Category:Cancer deaths in Maine Category:Deaths from lung cancer
